questions.question: The density of the liquid is 900kg/m3. The upper edge of triangular plate coincides with liquid surface. Find the position of the centre of pressure. Take h = 3.1 m, b = 3.1 m. Refer figure in the simulator.

The density of the liquid is 900kg/m3. The upper edge of triangular plate coincides with liquid surface. Find the position of the centre of pressure. Take h = 4.7 m, b = 4.7 m. Refer figure in the simulator.
